#Deploying Maven Artifact
= Introduction =

Developers note on how to deply artifact.
For details see [https://docs.sonatype.org/display/Repository/Sonatype+OSS+Maven+Repository+Usage+Guide].



= Details =

== Prerequisites ==
gpg key kreated and known pass phrase. See [https://docs.sonatype.org/display/Repository/How+To+Generate+PGP+Signatures+With+Maven].
Currently tomac.org key exists.

== Steps ==
 * add to .m2/settings.xml 
{{{
  <servers>
    <server>
      <id>sonatype-nexus-snapshots</id>
      <username>your-jira-id</username>
      <password>your-jira-pwd</password>
    </server>
    <server>
      <id>sonatype-nexus-staging</id>
      <username>your-jira-id</username>
      <password>your-jira-pwd</password>
    </server>
  </servers>
}}}
 * enable maven-gpg-plugin in pom.xml (default uncommented)
{{{
			<plugin>
				<groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
				<artifactId>maven-gpg-plugin</artifactId>
				<executions>
					<execution>
						<id>sign-artifacts</id>
						<phase>verify</phase>
						<goals>
							<goal>sign</goal>
						</goals>
					</execution>
				</executions>
			</plugin>
}}}


*Deploy*
mvn clean deploy

Give the passphrase of the key.
